0: RESOLUTION CALLING FOR AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, BY THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES ON THE STATUS OF THE NATURAL GAS-FIRED POWER PLANT AND LIQUEFIED NATURAL GAS (LNG) HUB TERMINAL PROJECT OF ENERGY WORLD CORPORATION (EWC) IN PAGBILAO GRANDE ISLAND, QUEZON PROVINCE AS A CASE FOR GOVERNMENT FACILITATION OF INVESTMENTS THAT CONTRIBUTE TO THE ATTAINMENT OF PRIORITIES OF PRESIDENT DUTERTE FOR ENERGY SECURITY AND ACCESS FORLOW-CARBON INDUSTRIALIZATION

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01034
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CALLING FOR AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, BY THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES ON THE STATUS OF THE NATURAL GAS-FIRED POWER PLANT AND LIQUEFIED NATURAL GAS (LNG) HUB TERMINAL PROJECT OF ENERGY WORLD CORPORATION (EWC) IN PAGBILAO GRANDE ISLAND, QUEZON PROVINCE AS A CASE FOR GOVERNMENT FACILITATION OF INVESTMENTS THAT CONTRIBUTE TO THE ATTAINMENT OF PRIORITIES OF PRESIDENT DUTERTE FOR ENERGY SECURITY AND ACCESS FORLOW-CARBON INDUSTRIALIZATION
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SALCEDA, JOEY SARTE
DATE FILED : 2017-05-29
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2017-08-30
      2. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-12-05
          -The Committee suspended consideration of House Resolution 1034, pending submission of reports by the EWC and the National Grid Corporation of the Philippines (NGCP) to update the Committee on their compliance with their obligation under the contract.
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON ENERGY ON 2017-07-26
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-05-30;
